name: in Dreams you can't find clocks
name_original: in Dreams you can't find clocks
description:
"in Dreams you can't find clocks" is a short adventure game about being stuck in a dream over and over again. 

 Game Cover

made in 48 Hours in during Ludum Dare 47 

how to play:

  • WASD to move
  • Space button to jump
  • E to interact

[Note] there is some Easter eggs in the game if you found any if them comment below :D
